title: Mamasa (2011) New Testament (Print) SABDA
description: Mamasa is an Austronesian language spoken in West Sulawesi, Indonesia. This language is the native language of the Mamasa people which is related to the Toraja people.

language.name: Mamasa
language.area: West Sulawesi, Polmas District, Polewali subdistrict, along Mamasa River.
